Model.Agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Agent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeleeAgent, RangedAgent

    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Agent class used to represent agents in SMA
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      FightStatus actionTurn(AbstractTerrain terrain, java.util.LinkedList<Agent> enemyTeam, java.util.LinkedList<Agent> alliedTeam)
      Turn of an agent : Find a place to move to attack an enemy The agent can either be at range of one or more enemies at the start of his turn and will focus the one he has more chance to win against Or he will try to find the 5 closest enemies and focus the fight he has more chance to win against

        speed - speed of movement
        strength - strength
        range - range of fighting
        color - color of the team

    • Method Detail

      • actionTurn

        public FightStatus actionTurn(AbstractTerrain terrain,
                              java.util.LinkedList<Agent> enemyTeam,
                              java.util.LinkedList<Agent> alliedTeam)
        Turn of an agent : Find a place to move to attack an enemy The agent can either be at range of one or more enemies at the start of his turn and will focus the one he has more chance to win against Or he will try to find the 5 closest enemies and focus the fight he has more chance to win against
        Parameters:
        terrain - the terrain
        enemyTeam - the enemy team
        alliedTeam - Healers ?
        Returns:
        the status of the Fight : WIN if he killed an enemy, LOST if he died in battle, DRAW if both units are alive after a fight or NO_FIGHT if he couldn't fight

      • attack

        public FightStatus attack(Agent enemy)
        Attack an enemy at Range
        Parameters:
        enemy - the focused enemy
        Returns:
        the status of the Fight : WIN if he killed an enemy, LOST if he died in battle, DRAW if both units are alive after a fight

      • moveTo

        protected boolean moveTo(AbstractTerrain terrain,
                         int posX,
                         int posY)
        Move an agent to the said coordinates on the terrain if the position is free of any agent
        Parameters:
        terrain - : the terrain
        posX - : the X coordinate
        posY - : the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the Agent moved or "moved" to the same place, false if he couldn't move

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)

        Parameters:
